physicsmod.menu.physics.ocean.error: §cOcean physics are incompatible with Immersive Portals and Farsight. Use Iris + Sodium (Fabric)/Oculus + Rubidium (Forge) instead.
physicsmod.menu.physics.collapse.error: §cYou can only change the collapse settings in the server config except for singleplayer (config/physicsmod/physics_server_config.json).
physicsmod.menu.physics.snow.error: §cSnow physics are incompatible with Immersive Portals and Farsight. Use Iris + Sodium (Fabric)/Oculus + Rubidium (Forge) instead.
physicsmod.menu.physics.dynamicblocks.er: §cDynamic Block physics are incompatible with Immersive Portals and Farsight.
